name: SHOOTING
content: If you're not shooting in the right direction, it doesn't matter how well you're shooting.

name: EDITING
content: While writing is like a joyful release, editing is a prison where the bars are my former

name: WEDDINGS
content: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person

name: EDITORIALS
content: There are a lot of editorials that have nothing to do with anything like that.
